evidence.source_document: Order Conditionally Granting Defendant's Emergency Motion for Limited Relief From Injunction
evidence.text: The Court held a hearing on the City’s emergency motion for relief on June 13 and 14, 2024. At the end of the hearing, the Court conditionally granted the City’s motion.

extracted.value: June 13–14, 2024: Hearing on City’s emergency motion for relief; outcome: conditional grant.

evidence.text: Temporary Restraining Order Hearing set for, Tuesday, 8/15/2023 at 10:00 AM. This proceeding will be held via a Zoom webinar.

extracted.value: 8/15/2023: Temporary Restraining Order Hearing (Zoom webinar) scheduled at 10:00 AM.

evidence.text: Preliminary Injunction Hearing set for 9/6/2023 at 10:00 AM in San Francisco, Courtroom 05, 17th Floor before Judge Edward M. Chen.

extracted.value: 9/6/2023: Preliminary Injunction Hearing (Zoom) scheduled at 10:00 AM in San Francisco, Courtroom 05, 17th Floor before Judge Edward M. Chen.

evidence.source_document: Order Conditionally Granting Defendant's Emergency Motion for Limited Relief From Injunction
evidence.text: An administrative hearing on those appeals is set for June 25, 2024.
